summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (23 ties).
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (23), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (16), Sonia Marmeladov (15), Katerina Ivanovna (14)
story_summary: Raskolnikov hurried to meet Svidrigailov, feeling a mix of anxiety and moral fatigue. He worried about whether Svidrigailov had visited Porfiry and contemplated the implications for his sister, Dounia. Upon arriving at a tavern, he spotted Svidrigailov at a table, who seemed to acknowledge Raskolnikov's presence with a sly smile before inviting him in.
